list_definition.definition: the raised area between or beside the lines in a train station

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They waited on the platform for their train to arrive
The London train will leave from platform 6.

list_definition.definition: a raised part of a floor eg in a hall, for speakers, entertainers etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The orchestra arranged themselves on the platform.
